attributes.action: Prime minister to Visit a Food Bank
attributes.additional_details:
People of the Britain ..

Iam Creating this Petition  - so that our globe trotting prime minister will one day visit a Foodbank sooner rather than later .. perhaps .. so he can see it in person .. and serve a service..and chat to some othe people who use food bank..

I urge the Prime minister to Visit a FoodBank.. So that - even though we are living in a age - where poverty is 200 yera old high.. We have to nmake sure our victorian Morals are held high..

though we do not have any charles dickens..we the people have common sense
